name: Angel
title: The Celestial Guardian
subtitle: A divine protector who shields allies and controls the battlefield
lore: A being of pure celestial energy, Angel descended from the heavens to protect those in need. With her divine powers, she can shield her allies from harm and control the flow of battle using her mastery over wind and light.

passive.name: Feather Collector
passive.description: Feathers appear in a large radius around Angel. Collecting a feather grants 1 charge to her passive (max 5 charges). The passive item can be activated on allies and enemies (+ herself). [7s cd/target]. Allies and self: [+45% MS] [3s]. Enemies: [-45% MS] [3s]

Q.name: Heavenly Beam
Q.description: Angel shoots a thin beam from her forehead in the targeted direction [0.3s charge time]. Hit enemies take [20/50/85/110/185/270]/tick damage. Ticks every [0.4s]

W.name: Windblast
W.description: Angel blows all hit enemies in the targeted direction, interrupting their movement.

E.name: Seraphic Shield
E.description: Angel flies to the designated ally, providing a shield for them and herself, blocking [121/243/400/630/729/945] damage.

R.name: Guardian Angel
R.description: Angel protects a selected hero, making them immune for [3s]. Cannot be cast on herself.

1.name: Divine Protection
1.description: QUEST: Use your E ability 20 times -> REWARD: During Seraphic Shield, you also negate [+8%] damage.

1.name: Burning Touch
1.description: Angel's autoattacks burn the target, dealing [5% AD] damage over [3s]. [Max 10 charges/target].

1.name: Celestial Restoration
1.description: When Angel takes damage, she restores [+10%] mana and [7%] Health [15s cd].

5.name: Divine Ray
5.description: The width and range of Q slightly increase.

5.name: Powerful Gust
5.description: The width and knockback of E increase.

10.name: Extended Protection
10.description: After the R ability expires, the affected ally receives a Seraphic Shield.

10.name: Divine Speed
10.description: Allies under the effect of R gain [+70% MS].

15.name: Swift Guardian
15.description: Angel's W, E, and R abilities lose [2s cd].

15.name: Empowering Shield
15.description: Allies affected by the E ability gain [+0.4 AS] during the shield's effect.

20.name: Divine Protection
20.description: Allies sped up by your passive gain [10%] magic damage immunity during the speed boost.

20.name: Divine Empowerment
20.description: Allies protected by R deal [10%] more damage.

20.name: Double Shield
20.description: The E ability gains a second charge, but the shield does not stack.

weaknesses: Vulnerable when abilities are on cooldown
